pkgmetadata.longdescription: Construct Reactive Calibrated Axes Biplots // A modern view on the principal component analysis biplot with calibrated axes. Create principal component analysis biplots rendered in HTML with significant reactivity embedded within the plot. Furthermore, the traditional biplot view is enhanced by translated axes with inter-class kernel densities superimposed. For more information on biplots, see Gower, J.C., Lubbe, S. and le Roux, N.J. (2011, ISBN: 978-0-470-01255-0).
